name: Diceball
description:
Created for the 2022 GMTK Gamejam

Theme: Roll of the Dice

Hit the dice to roll!
Get Home Runs to achieve the maximum score!

You move a base only if the dice gets a pair

Foul Balls restart the positions of the other team

Controls

A mouse

Hold the mouse when you hit the ball to set the force

Known problems:

-When you enter the full screen with the build-in unity button  the game acts weird when throwing you balls

-Sometimes the game won't end even if you have 3 outs

-The Game Over screen doesn't shows the real score

Diceball_0_7 has the unity template
